pr_title: BAEL-4230 - Adding Introduction to Spring Data JDBC Project

timeline.bodyText:
The persistence-modules directory would be a better place for this code. After moving, also need to reference this new module in the persistence-modules/pom.xml so that it's included in the automated builds.
Note that the parent module can continue to be parent-boot-2, if that's still appropriate, but you'll need to add the relativepath node.
timeline.author: KevinGilmore
KevinGilmore

timeline.bodyText: The code for the article should be in a package specific to the article, in case we ever need to move it to a different module or in case additional articles are added to this module. How about com.baeldung.springdatajdbcintro
timeline.author: KevinGilmore
KevinGilmore

timeline.message: BAEL-4230 - Adding Introduction to Spring Data JDBC Project
removing duplicates modules from the rebase
Merge branch 'BAEL-4230' of https://github.com/rshtishi/tutorials into BAEL-4230
